abstract: Google invests in North Dakota wind farms as it seeks financial returns and hopes to accelerate the deployment of renewable energy.
snippet: Google invests in North Dakota wind farms as it seeks financial returns and hopes to accelerate the deployment of renewable energy.
lead_paragraph: Google has long dabbled in the clean energy business. Now the company is investing in the generation of green power.

headline.main: Google Invests $39 Million in Wind Farms
